Advisory:
CVE-2020-13596: Possible XSS via admin ForeignKeyRawIdWidget. Query parameters for the admin ForeignKeyRawIdWidget were not properly URL encoded, posing an XSS attack vector. ForeignKeyRawIdWidget now ensures query parameters are correctly URL encoded.

Additionally, Django 2.2.13 and 3.0.7 upgrade the version of jQuery used by the admin to 3.5.1 for security reasons.
